snippet: Russell Westbrook scored 19 points and grabbed 10 rebounds, Kevin Durant added 19 points, and Oklahoma City gave itself a winning record for the first time this season.
abstract: NBA's Oklahoma City Thunder beat Miami Heat, 94-86, moving above .500 record for first time in season.
lead_paragraph: Russell Westbrook scored 19 points and grabbed 10 rebounds, Kevin Durant added 19 points, and Oklahoma City gave itself a winning record for the first time this season.

headline.main: Thunder Climb Over the .500 Mark by Topping the Heat
